description: Apply recurrence, category, and priority filters after status + search and exclude recurring parents before grouping.

tasks.title: Apply recurrence, category, priority filters in pipeline
tasks.description: As a developer, I need the filtering pipeline to apply dropdown filters after status and search so results match selections.
acceptanceCriteria: Call applyTaskFilters(filtered, { recurrence, category, priority }, recurrenceByParentId) after filterAndSearchTasks
Recurrence filter supports: recurring, non-recurring, daily, weekly, monthly, yearly
Category filter supports: all, uncategorized (no tags), tag id match
Priority filter supports: all, low, medium, high
Exclude recurring parent tasks from final filtered list
Pipeline order: status/search → dropdown filters → remove parents → grouping
